title: Handbark Academy by Alexander Nanitchkov
author: Alexander Nanitchkov
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Handbark Academy by Alexander Nanitchkov
text:
Cover Art
 Handbark Academy
 Alexander Nanitchkov was born in Sofia, Bulgaria and is now 31. A graduate of the Sofia Academy of Fine Arts, he has been painting traditional art for 12 years, favoring acrylic paints on canvas. Recently, he has started to delve deeper into digital art. He has been heavily influenced by the "old masters" and Asian artwork, and is now exploring conceptual environments and character design.
